website_summaries.verdict: A highly functional watch that includes a stopwatch function and can even be worn while scuba diving.
pros: Nice looking gold-plated, stainless steel design
Solid, heavyweight and highly durable for everyday wear
Arrives with plenty of links in the band which are adjustable to fit your wrist size
cons: A handful of buyers have issues with the gold plating chipping, but only seems to affect a minority

customer_reviews.title: Showy but elegant
customer_reviews.text: It's very shiny more than I expected, despite that is a great watch is a little big and heavy , however looks nice, well my final thought, when you buy Invicta your buying quality at affordable price, this is very visual attractive, because the color and big size, you won't be unnoticed with this one. So if you are discrete person this is not for you, otherwise go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, but too bulky and heavy
customer_reviews.text: The pictures can give this watch its right, it is huge! I mean really really really huge, much thicker than you would expect from a wrist watch, it is explainable though, as this watch is divers' one, and supposed to withstand 300 meters , the craftsmanship is amazing, and if you can deal with the bulk and weight ( yes it is really heavy) , then you can't go wrong with this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Mahmood Al-Rawi

customer_reviews.title: Worth twice what i paid...at least!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures do not do this watch justice! I liked the look of the 3D gallery image so i read the reviews from buyers and decided to purchase for my boyfriend. I was NOT disappointed. Great piece and worth at least twice what i paid. Couldn't find any information on the 18k gold plated but did come with warranty information and instructions as well as designer box just as if i purchased at retailer. Large piece, good for today's modern men's fashion. Simple. Classy.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar

customer_reviews.title: So far so good I have had the watch for 3 days now ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I have had the watch for 3 days now and I am really liking it. I read many reviews before buying this watch. A good portion if the reviews made reference to how big and heavy this watch is. Lemme say, I collect watches and have ones that are big and heavy. But WOW there was no exaggeration with this one. It is a behemoth. The watch came in perfect condition all set and ready to wear, with the exception of wrist size. I you like big watches you will not be disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with Jeans & White button up.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, weight, and craftsmanship. This watch goes well with business attire. Also goes very well with Jeans and a white fitted shirt. This watch gets alot of attention. The watch is heavy in weight and the clock face is large. The band comes in 3xl and will need to get resized. I did mine my self using a paperclip and needle nose pliers. If you want to do it yourself, watch a youtube how to on adjusting watch bands. I love this watch. I also have a black pro diver. I switch them up every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Classy! Looks like a million dollars!
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my husband (I buy him a new watch every Christmas). This one, by far, is the most beautiful watch I've ever bought him. The face is a little on the large size, but not overwhelmingly large. Makes for a very manly, very expensive looking piece. Very classy, very stylish, super masculine. He gets compliments whenever he wears it.
customer_reviews.author: Miyoshi1018

customer_reviews.title: One thing bad - the buckle thing is way way too tight
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch. Its a large size so make sure you have larger hands for it to look pleasently proportional. One thing bad - the buckle thing is way way too tight, if you got talons of a harpy eagle you will have no problems opening it.
customer_reviews.author: oleeeee

customer_reviews.title: It was beautifully wrapped. The Quality of the watch was just ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend for Valentines Day. I had noticed he had been eyeing different specifically "Gold" watches so i thought i would surprise him with this. I found this watch to be very Sexy/Classy. When this came in. It was beautifully wrapped. The Quality of the watch was just exquisite! My boyfriend LOVED it... And when i say LOVED it literally has wore it every single day since Valentines day to work and to nice outings. He gets compliments alot on it. I recommend this watch if you are looking for something sharp, classy & sophisticated!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a classic man watch ... You're search is over. This is the ultimate. I've been buying Invicta watches for years. I still have my 1st one from back in 2007 and yep still ticking. If you're into the big face watch look you won't be disappointed. I have 8 to 10 of them in my collection and I've gotten compliments on all of them even the one I like the least lol.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bates

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite watches even though I have several costing much more
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite watches even though I have several costing much more. It's big but not too big. Solid feel and looks much more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch.  Very Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Have worn a few times but it is very heavy. A diver could get along with less lead weight when wearing this watch. Missed the return date because of personal unavailability. would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: His grandfather and father have each been recipients of these wonderful and beautiful time pieces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my grandson for Christmas this year. His grandfather and father have each been recipients of these wonderful and beautiful time pieces. They are so accurate and truly loved by the owners. Great purchase, I know my grandson will truly love this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C. Wesoloski

customer_reviews.title: Too big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: The watch is BIG. I saw reviews saying that the watch was big and I was like it doesn’t matter I have a big hand but once it came in I noticed it was real big. I had to down size it i took like 5 of them things to make it thigh and then it did fit. But the. When I had it on for a while the crown was hurting my hand it don’t feel to comfortable. Other than that the style is nice and has good detail.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: OVER THE TOP!!
customer_reviews.text: Over the top. Invicta quality and style all day long. This watch looks very expensive and is very impressive. It's a real head turner.Will be purchasing more 48mm Invicta Pro Diver/Scubas in the future. BBW "Big Bad Watch!"
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sharpie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but really big
customer_reviews.text: I returned this watch but I’m giving it a 4 star because it’s beautiful. But it’s huge, like many others have mentioned but even larger than I thought. I wouldn’t recommend this unless you have a larger than average arm and wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Dvany

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I saw the pictures, read some reviews. It all failed to capture the magnificence of the watch. It's is quite thick, heavy, and gaudy, which isn't a bad thing if you like flash. As a gift for my dad, he loved it. If he was satisfied, I'm ecstatic. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jared McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Bling Bling Bling
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and a extreme eye catcher......This watch can and will make a person look like a million bucks. Bought for husband as a surprise gift and he fell in love immediately. I recommend if you want class
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Jones

customer_reviews.title: frickin amazing wicked watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, its huge and well a little too heavy but it makes me look like a gangster. Lol. I had to have it sized tho cuz the band is way too long. Its like no other watch i have ever bought. This is a mans watch no doubt!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: When it first showed up... I loved it... but after a little bit of time the gold plating is starting to wear off.... kinda upset about that
customer_reviews.author: K S.

customer_reviews.title: ... week posting reviews are correct it's big bulky and beautiful had to remove about 4 links jeweler didn't believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it last week posting reviews are correct it's big bulky and beautiful had to remove about 4 links jeweler didn't believe I paid 118.00 $ they sell Invicta watches similar 500.00 -800.00 picture doest do justice
customer_reviews.author: anthony serritella

customer_reviews.title: HOMERUN Invicta...
customer_reviews.text: Get a TON of comments about this watch. I love it! I am a muscular guy with big forearms and wrists, however this watch still looks big on me. So, if you have small wrists or arms, it's gonna look goofy!
customer_reviews.author: Devil Doc

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice watch. Looks great on wrist
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice gold watch. Looks great on wrist. Thia is a huge, heavy watch, I saw that description on other reviews and figured how big can it be? They are right.
customer_reviews.author: THGDriver

customer_reviews.title: Like Jessica Simpson - Big and Beautiful But Not That Comfortable to Wear.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch for the money. Very heavy watch. Very big and thick. Had to remove three links from the band and I have a fairly big wrist. Better than being too small, I guess. Not my most comfortable watch by far, but still looks good. Could have sold it in Thailand for about 100,000 baht. They really do not know their watches over in Thailand.
customer_reviews.author: HRPuckinfutz

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. After five months of use this watch still looks and feels ok. Unfortuantely, it no longer works. Though the battery has been changed, the watch still does not function so, I have changed my original 5 stars to 2 stars. Big disappointment!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aladia S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece
customer_reviews.text: Like most Invicta's it's heavy, but a very nice watch. Gets a ton of attention!looks like a much more expensive watch.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: GEORGEOUS WATCH
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. Anytime I wear the watch people notice. It is a work of art and meant to last a long time. A purchase well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Minor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: First off. Let me say wow!! If you need a expensive look at a great price, this watch is for you. It's a beautiful piece of watch. Its huge and heavy. I took mine to a jeweler to get the links remove to fit my hands and he was blown away by the look, design n weight. I was also. I love it. My friends thinks I paid $2700usd for it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jemoye Charles

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves thiswatch. It looks great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. It looks great! He gets lots of compliments on it. Be aware, this is a BIG watch. Check the measurements before ordering to make sure it is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: hpshpr

customer_reviews.title: Bold and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. Looks good on his arm and Mr. GQ loves it!
customer_reviews.author: celteyes

customer_reviews.title: Bold and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch! Bulky but yet classy! Invicta never fails to impress. I have many watches but this is my go to for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts because of the low price but now that I got it, it's great! Buy it. It's a big watch but looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The main thing I love about this Invicta watch as I do with the other five Invicta watches that I own is their attention to detail! I just received this watch today and it looks even better in person than it does in the pictures!! This is my new favorite watch
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: nice look
customer_reviews.text: This is a good gadget for the price. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Mello

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. I'm very happy witch my purchase. The product arrived in the estimated time. I really recommend this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Santana

customer_reviews.title: The finish is beautiful and the movement is stellar
customer_reviews.text: This watch is huge and fits my wrist perfectly. The finish is beautiful and the movement is stellar. I like the large hands so I can see them without my reading glasses. Tough as nails and build like an Italian tank! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Delia

customer_reviews.title: excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: Top product I liked quite soon I will buy more ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY Stylish Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch very stylish and affordable, also a great eye catching watch 😎
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. I’ve bought him these brand watches before.. he always gets several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Nesha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Have received many, many compliments. Buy at the right price point and you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friend. He absolutely loves showing it off!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dale

customer_reviews.title: The Watch is heavy and very noticeable
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a great value for the money. It will arrive much too big for anyones' wrist. I have had several compliments on it and i dont see any sign of fading or wear and i wear it daily. would highly recommend this purchase to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RL N M!@m!

customer_reviews.title: Looks and the weighted watch
customer_reviews.text: My half really love this watch, I brought for him for Christmas gift for 2018; the weight and the way it looks, you think I paid a lot of money for this watch. It’s truly a great conversation pieces for watch lover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. Its big and looks very nice. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Kahrs

customer_reviews.title: I do like it, and have received many compliments
customer_reviews.text: The watch is VERY LARGE and heavy. I do like it, and have received many compliments. The weight and size takes some used to, but should be fine. I did have to get several links removed to get it to fit on my wrist comfortably, without falling off my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Invicta makes a great and stylish watch.  Hudge selection to please everyone
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. What a fantastic price on a perfectly made watch. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: diveguy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful time piece
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers are not kidding when they say it's big, but that's one of the reasons I love it. For the price I paid, in my eyes anyway, it's worth three times as much. It's built solid.
customer_reviews.author: John Humenik

customer_reviews.title: Invicta Watch for Men
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband as a birthday gift. He loves it!! This is one of his best gifts ever. I will be purchasing more Invicta watches.
customer_reviews.author: Jennice Walton

customer_reviews.title: Paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch It got here very quickly but the down side is that it’s extremly heavy an large .
customer_reviews.author: Stallion

customer_reviews.title: Indescribable!
customer_reviews.text: This picture doesn't do the watch any justice. I definitely took a leap of faith when ordering it and it was the best decision of my life. My husband was so excited. It is definitely a big face watch and meant for a big man! Looooooovvvvvvveeee it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to brother in law for Christmas and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: W. A.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Watch from an Incredible company!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time and as usual Invicta made an incredible watch for roughly $100.00 this is my second Invicta but it most definitely will not be my last. If you love larger/heavier watches like I do this is perfect. I love Invicta watches and I love shopping on Amazon. Perfect combination! I even enjoy watching them on TV?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sehmer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’3 240 and this watch is perfect on my wrist. I have a few invicta watches and so far this one is favorite. It’s also my biggest invicta. Nice made and heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: larry smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Best watch out there in my opinion will buy 100 more

customer_reviews.title: If you love a big watch with swag then this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is unbelievably nicer. It fits perfectly into my collections. If you love a big watch with swag then this is the right way to go.

customer_reviews.title: got what i paid for.
customer_reviews.text: what i liked about this product was i got what i paid for. I hate purchasing items and be let down when the product arrives.it's cheap,it,s a scam,it,s totally false advertisment. this is everything i expected and more. A real WINNER!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth much more.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is arge and looks great. I will use it as a dress watch also

customer_reviews.title: I have one other Invicta that I absolutely love. Be sure to check weight before buying
customer_reviews.text: TOO BULKY !!! Some Invictas just seem too large and cumbersome to wear. I have one other Invicta that I absolutely love. Be sure to check weight before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Watch Addict Approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my son-in-law for Christmas and he was very pleased with it. We both found it to be a very handsome watch, and, both being watch addicts, gave it our immediate seal of approval. The only problem I have is I may have to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Very BOLD and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is an attention getter. The gold accents any style of clothing. Great gift for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Brown

customer_reviews.title: Large face, heavy watch and fits xtra large wrist
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous heavy ( my husband likes them heavy). Will fit a large man as my son tried it on and he has a extra large wrist and it was still big. My husband loved it as he does all his invicta watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attention Grabber
customer_reviews.text: This watch is huge and heavy. I already own 2 Lupah's and this by far a heavier piece. It looks great and takes some getting used to. It catches the attention of others. If you do not want "Flashy" this is not the watch for you.
customer_reviews.author: Terence K. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! The finish is awesome and works as it should. I like that it has some weight to it. I recommend any Invicta watch.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: i first bought a invictawatch about 6 years ago i have since bought others ...
customer_reviews.text: i first bought a invicta watch about 6 years ago i have since bought others as gifts to my sons same response they love the watches my youngest son does scuba diving and finds it invaluable great watches

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a very beautiful watch but too large. Sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: Invicta Mens 0074 Large gold watch
customer_reviews.text: This Gold tone invicta watch is beautiful in color. Its big, bold and beautiful. When you wear this watch out, it gets its own attention. I would recommend this watch to any man that wants a big beautiful watch on his wrist. I think you just like me will love this watch. Has nice weight to it and sports an awesome professional look.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Invicta watch for the quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice gold watch on Amazon and I ran across the Invicta watch and After looking at the watch and reading the good reviews on the watch, I decided to purchase it. I'm very happy with my purchase.

Amazing looking watch.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch, it is big and flashy and has good weight to it and in light this thing shines. I would recommend this watch to anyone. Had to resize it though myself because it comes big. I see no flaws other than if you have a small wrist and want to wear it on the left arm the dial will dig into your hand a little. So I wear it on the right.

customer_reviews.title: Grown Man's Style
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a grown man's timepiece. Gave to my Dad for his birthday and he absolutely loves it! The band was a little large so he had it adjusted at a local jeweler in about 5 mins. If your looking to wow the special man in your life this will do it!!!

customer_reviews.text: Watch is a head turner. Great time peace for the price. 5 year warranty when I signed up with Invicta.. A+
customer_reviews.author: Yullin

product_meta.title: Invicta Men's 0074 pro Diver Analog Japanese Quartz 18k Gold-plated Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
With a bold design, this Invicta chronograph has a poised and calm ambience that’s sure to have you looking twice.




With its most inspired creations yet, Invicta demonstrates its technical and design prowess, offering timepieces of style for extreme value.

"We have long held firm to the belief that supremely crafted timepieces can be offered for extremely modest sums. It is the founding principle of our flagship and the radical notion that still drives us today. By being true to our convictions, we will continue to turn the balance of power, and deliver true Swiss luxury to anyone who desires it. Let all those who possess our timepieces and pass through our doors witness the quality, value and care in every piece we create, and the spirit of never-ending possibilities in everything we do."

These are the words that greet visitors and motivate team members inside the Invicta Watch Group's new worldwide headquarters. Emblazoned in stainless steel, it has been the Invicta message since Day One.

 With each new timepiece, the company sends up a flare for those looking to be defined not by how much they spend, but how wisely they spend. With its strong collections, the gutsy Swiss brand is guaranteed to keep attracting followers. 

 The art of the craft. Inside an Invicta Workshop

It takes years of training and a great deal of pride to achieve glorious Swiss timepieces by hand. But it takes guts and the courage of your convictions to make those timepieces affordable for everyone who appreciates them.

 At our Swiss workshops, we mix time-honored traditions with a little bit of horse sense every single day to produce the greatest values in the watch-making world. 






PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  Sample Case Size Cutout [PDF 212kb] For additional assistance in setting the time or adjusting your watch, please download the Instruction Manual [PDF 425kb] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.6 x 4.2 x 3.7 inches; 1.06 Pounds
 * Item model number :0074
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :January 16, 2005
 * Manufacturer :Invicta
 * ASIN :B00075U5I0

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #10671 inMen's Shops

These are the words that greet visitors and motivate team members inside the Invicta Watch Group's new worldwide headquarters. Emblazoned in stainless steel, it has been the Invicta message since Day One.

 With each new timepiece, the company sends up a flare for those looking to be defined not by how much they spend, but how wisely they spend. With its strong collections, the gutsy Swiss brand is guaranteed to keep attracting followers.

feature_bullets: Round watch in brushed and polished 18k gold-plated stainless steel featuring sunray dial with gunmetal-tone markers, arrow-shape skeleton hands, and multi-link bracelet
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Synthetic-sapphire crystal dial window. Band length is 215 mm and size is 26 mm
Features chronograph functions with 60 second, 60 minute, 24 hour subdials, unidirectional bezel, luminous hands and markers, and magnified date window
Water resistant to 660 feet (200 M): suitable for recreational scuba diving.Caliber: VD53
The stopwatch can measure up to 60 minutes. Bezel Function - Uni-directional
